pr_title: JBPM-9266 : Stunner - Called element in Reusable sub-process is not populated

timeline.bodyText: looks tricky.. :) Why need for scheduling it? Can't we instead, observe to some CDI event or use some callback on the code, in order to avoid this?
timeline.author: romartin

replies.bodyText: Hi @romartin fixed, used PostConstruct method instead
replies.author: inodeman

timeline.message: JBPM-9266 : Stunner - Called element in Reusable sub-process is not populated

timeline.bodyText:
Do we need GwtMockito here? Mockito also has a spy method.
Also looks like spied object is not used later.
timeline.author: hasys

replies.bodyText: Hi @hasys you are right, we dont need it anymore, It was back when I used the Timer, will remove
replies.author: inodeman
